snippet: A man armed with a bottle of flammable liquid set himself and a police officer ablaze Wednesday before another officer shot the suspect at a suburban Dallas shopping strip, police said....

headline.print_headline: 3 Officers, Male Suspect Burned in Confrontation
headline.main: 3 Officers, Male Suspect Burned in Confrontation

lead_paragraph: A man armed with a bottle of flammable liquid set himself and a police officer ablaze Wednesday before another officer shot the suspect at a suburban Dallas shopping strip, police said.
